amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the United States Emergency Refugee and Migration Assistance Fund by $30 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to increase funding (by offset) for the United States Emergency Refugee and Migration Assistance Fund by $30 million. The offset comes from a $30 million reduction of funding for the Andean Counterdrug Initiative.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 229 (Roll no. 242).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A007) offered by Mr. McGovern.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McGovern amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 174 - 229 (Roll no. 242).
